name: Every World Has a Pizzeria
description:
Every World Has a PizzeriaDescription

Have you ever wondered what goes on inside a snow globe? Well... they have pizzerias there too! And in this game you are responsible of delivering the pizzas in time. You must remember to have your car always loaded with pizzas so you can deliver them before the clock runs out!

"EWHAP" was developed for Ludum Dare #38 and we are really proud of it!

Please leave your opinion or feedback about the game. We'll be very happy if you do so :)

Controls
  • wasd / arrow keys: move
  • space: break the car
  • Q / E: throw pizzas!
  • F: horn to the pizzeria to receive more pizzas
How to Play

Press F in front of the pizzeria to receive pizzas for delivery. You can deliver the pizzas by pressing Q and E. Places where you have to deliver will appear colored with a big arrow on top of the building. Try to not hit your car and have fun being a pizza deliveryman on a snow globe!

Credits

  • midup: art and illustrations
  • joel_asj: music and sfx
